Title: James & Niros Restaurant
Description: Please contact us for the latest mouth-watering selection. You may also check the overview tab for more details about us.
Overview: A tourist haven and a tranquility retreat, it offers sophistication and an exquisite cuisine for those who like gourmet food and a relaxing atmosphere for socialising and escape from the daily routine. We also offer catering facilities for groups, and can organize parties, weddings, buffets, picnics, barbeques and many other events upon request.
